actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from making or enforcing any rule requiring all borrowers under such Act to demonstrate a positive cash flow, without taking into account the individual characteristics of borrowers.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from making or enforcing any rule that would impose uniform borrower positive cash flow requirements without accounting for individual borrower characteristics.

titles.title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from making or enforcing any rule requiring all borrowers under such Act to demonstrate a positive cash flow, without taking into account the individual characteristics of borrowers.
